hesml.measures.impl

Class MeasureResnik

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.measures.impl.SimilaritySemanticMeasure
      • hesml.measures.impl.MeasureResnik
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimilarityMeasure

    class MeasureResnik
extends SimilaritySemanticMeasure
    This class implements the IC-based simialrity measure introduced by Resnik in the paper below. Resnik, P. (1995). Using information content to evaluate semantic similarity in a taxonomy. In Proc. of the International Joint Conferences on Artificial Intelligence (IJCAI 1995) (Vol. 1, pp. 448–453). Montreal, Canada.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-Díaz
